dc_title_s: 2011 National Household Survey, Place of Work Status by Industry (North American Industry Classification System 2007) at the Census Tract (CT) Level [custom tabulation]
dc_description_s: This dataset is a custom tabulation of the 2011 National Household Survey containing statistics on work activity and place of work status in 2010 by industry, classified by the North American Industry Classification System of 2007, at the census tract (CT) level.
